name: Archeologist Simulator
description:
Like a true explorer, look for all the bones hidden underground to build the dinosaur skeleton. Children will all enjoy the various game modes. The most appealing of all is definitely digging. They will learn about dinosaurs with puzzles and sound effects and can color the characters using a magic brush.

The game graphics are carefully designed and the game itself plenty of fun for your children and yourself.

- Dig for all the dinosaur bones
- Assembles the dinosaur skeleton with the bones you have found
- Play and learn with puzzles, animations and sound effects
